modName: Alice the Beautiful Nord - Follower Edition
summary: An attractive Nord woman I made using RaceMenu - now a follower!
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center]Alice - A beautiful follower[/center][/size][color=#9900ff]
[/color]
My custom preset, Alice, is now a follower! Now you and her can travel the cold heartless land of Skyrim together, and maybe even become bonded by Mara's grace!
[size=2]
Mod Requirements:[/size]
[size=2]RaceMenu by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481]expired6978[/url] (along with it's requirements)
Fair Skin Complexion by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4557236]HHaleyy[/url]
The Witcher 3 Eyes by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2235573]Oaristys[/url]
KS Hairdos - Renewal by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665]Kalilies[/url]
Better Females Eyebrows - Standalone by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665]Kalilies
[/url]
Optional:
Seductive Lips HD by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3676578]EcthelionOtW[/url]
Freckle Mania by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/981329]tetrodoxin[/url]
[/size]

[size=4][center]A brief overview:[/center][/size]
[color=#e06666][size=3]Combat:[/size][/color]
Her combat style is a mix between an archer and a swordsman, although she will use any two-handed weapons you decide to give to her. She is set to level with the player, from level 1 to 100. She does not affect stealth! I also gave her the light foot perk - nothing annoys me more than followers setting off those easy-to-see traps. 

[color=#f9cb9c][size=3]Equipment:[/size][/color]
She starts off with hide armor, a steel sword, and a hunting bow - a nice starter kit for those thirsting for a ripe adventure.
[size=3][color=#6aa84f]
Location:[/color]
[/size]She can be found as early as level 1 within Whiterun's Hall of the Dead. 

[color=#c9daf8][size=3]Installation:[/size]
[/color]Download with Manager, it makes life simple.


Please endorse if you like the mod, I really appreciate it! :D
Hey! If you like this follower a lot, you can even play as her! Check out my other mod, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83021/?]Alice the Beautiful Nord - A RaceMenu preset[/url]!
As stated in my previous mod, feel free to use, edit, and customize this follower all you want. If you upload her somewhere else, or publish her with some changes, all I ask is for credit <3 
[center]
[size=4]Credits:[/size][/center]
This mod would not have been possible without the amazing Make a Follower Workshop MAFKit 2017 by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10907738]Ashes2Asherz[/url]. He made an awesome mod that can do awesome things with a great tutorial. Please, go check it out!

[/url]Immersive Weapons by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3656551]hothtrooper44[/url]

author: Bohannoncannon
